summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Context Intelligence Platform with new agent-focused UI. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend functionality working correctly. New white/blue theme implemented, 4 agent tabs functional, CodeHealth and Employee agents integrated with LLM responses.
passed_tests: CodeHealth Agent API (/api/agent/codehealth) - returns checklist and related PRs
Employee Agent API - Engineer role (/api/agent/employee) - returns pr_draft
Employee Agent API - Manager role (/api/agent/employee) - returns slack_message
Header displays 'Context Intelligence' and 'Powered by busfactor AI'
4 agent tabs visible (CodeHealth, Employee, OnCall with 'Soon', Document with 'Soon')
CodeHealth tab shows form with PR title input and Analyze button
Employee tab shows role selector (Engineer/Manager) and task input
Completed Tasks section visible and functional
Integration Builder section visible with available blocks
Tab navigation between CodeHealth and Employee works
OnCall and Document tabs correctly disabled with 'Soon' indicators
Frontend-backend integration working with LLM responses
Horizontal split layout with chat interface and builder preview
